description:
When Koharun forgets her lunch at home, she plans on buying at the school store, but finds that it`s just as mobbed as depicted in anime and manga. At the club, the theme is a "new newspaper club", and the girls come up with an entire retro-style manga/anime series. Finally, Mobuko joins the members in the gym for an activity that embarrasses Koharun to no end!
Source: crunchyroll
